name: Elemental Dodge
description:
Elemental Dodge
Made by TheAnimeFreak

use w a s d keys
 w makes you dash forward
 a turns left
 s does a short dash backwards
 d turns right

Fire
Water
Earth
Wind
Light 
Dark

You are wind
You are always moving
Go into the light spell to teleport to the center
Tear apart fire with your tornado for extra points
Water will chase in pursuit of you
Stone can block you, but the stone doesn't move
Darkness will extinguish the water and turn into a Black hole
The Black hole is fast and it gradually gets faster
